judges: Before Stern, Stearne, Jones and Bell, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order is affirmed on the opinion of the learned court below.
Mr. Justice Bell dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert T. McCracken, with him Russell S. Machmer and George G. Chandler, for appellants.
Bernard G. Segal, with him Frederick E. Lark, County Solicitor, Carl Rice, Gilbert W. Oswald, and Schnader, Harrison, Segal & Lewis, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Shroyer, Appellant, v. Thomas.
Argued June 21, 1951.
Before Stern, Stearne, Jones and Bell, JJ.
Robert T. McCracken, with him Russell S. Machmer and George G. Chandler, for appellants.
Bernard G. Segal, with him Frederick E. Lark, County Solicitor, Carl Rice, Gilbert W. Oswald, and Schnader, Harrison, Segal & Lewis, for appellees.
June 22, 1951:
